item.title: Potter 2.0.1
item.description:
Latest release with auto-update support
Features: - AI-powered text processing with OpenAI, Anthropic, and Google Gemini - Global hotkey support (Cmd+Shift+9) - Native macOS integration with menu bar - Secure API key storage in Keychain - Dynamic prompt system - Auto-update functionality with Sparkle framework - Improved storage adapter system - Enhanced error handling
This release includes the StorageAdapter system for improved API key management.
